video_title: Do this TO BE SUCCESSFUL in your life #mindestmotivation #growth #inspiration
transcript:
so here's a really really simple
strategy to be successful write down all
of your goals reason why I say that is
because Harvard did a study in the 1970s
with all of their graduating class and
found out that only 3% of those students
who were graduating wrote down their
goals but 10 years later they followed
up with all of those students and found
out that the 3% that wrote down their
goals were more than 10 times more
successful than the entire 97% combined
they didn't write down their goals and
so that brings the question why is that
well cuz when you write down your goals
it makes them real it makes them
physically exist in this world and when
it's on paper it makes it so much easier
to be planned so if somebody wants to be
really successful it's real simple just
start by writing down your goals
